variant.question: What is the effect of an engine failure of a multi-engined piston aeroplane in a steady climb on V~X~ and on the angle of climb, with the propeller of the failed engine in the feathered position?

options.text: V~X~ Increases and the angle of climb decreases.
V~X~ decreases and the angle of climb increases.
